alert.note: Alert for Dodge; Fillmore; Mower; Olmsted; Wabasha; Winona (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 03 at 11:59AM CST until January 03 at 6:00PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A Wintry Mix Still Impacting Parts of the Area... .A mix of winter precipitation is still impacting parts of the area with some snow, rain, sleet, and even some isolated rumbles of thunder. Temperatures continue to gradually warm in most areas so the icing from overnight and early this morning has diminished quite a bit. None the less, parts of southeast Minnesota and north central Wisconsin will be close enough to the freezing mark into tonight that more mixed precipitation is expected. The precipitation will be mixed with snow at times as well. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Minnesota through central Wisconsin. * WHEN...Until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Isolated power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice. Plan on slippery to hazardous road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, visit 511mn.org for road conditions. In Wisconsin, visit 511wi.gov for road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Dodge; Fillmore; Mower; Olmsted; Wabasha; Winona
